title: WATERMELONS  This is the first year Ive had enough space to grow large.

subtasks: Digging small holes above the ground.
Ensuring holes are suitable for clay soil.
Planting watermelon seeds in elevated positions.
Counting seedlings in a mound to ten.
Selecting the strongest three or four seedlings.
Providing enough space for vines to run up to 20 feet.
Extending vine growth beyond the planting bed.
Managing vine spread to accommodate growth.
